From the brand

Humidifiers 250ML & 2L

Humidifiers 4L & 6L

Tank Cleaners & Heating Pads

Heating Pads & Massagers

Heating Wrap & Spin Scrubbers

THE PERFECT BALANCE BETWEEN POWER AND PORTABILITY: The lightweight compact, slim design makes it the perfect choice for any environment. A great humidifier for bedroom, office, baby room, or car, just turn it on, and enjoy better, healthier air
BOOST COMFORT LEVELS INSTANTLY: The ultrasonic cool mist humidifier comes with two mist modes – continuous & intermittent – able to change the environmental humidity in minutes. An intuitive one-button control, without needless and complicated settings, and an auto shut-off feature for your safety and calmness
INSTANT DRYNESS FIXER: YOUR LUNGS WILL THANK YOU! Our brand new humidifier for bedroom or office incorporates an elegant, compact design, making it super-portable and easy to use. Erie desk humidifier will fine-tune the humidity levels of your surroundings, allowing you to breathe a healthier air, and make your environment a lot more pleasant
SLEEP TIGHT: While you are sound asleep, our humidifiers for bedrooms moisturize the room at the 38dB noise level. The unit is as quiet as a ticking clock
SILENT STEALTHY FUNCTION FOR DREAMY NIGHTS: Great for sleeping, it also doubles as a night-light! Soft on your eyes, this nifty little feature makes it the ideal humidifier to use at night or as a baby humidifier for nursery, offering a relaxed, quiet environment for a sound and healthy sleep.
1-YEAR WARRANTY: RISK-FREE PURCHASE & HASSLE-FREE REPLACEMENT. Please don’t hesitate to reach out. We would be more than willing to assist! Just a little tip: to increase the life of the humidifier, we recommend using GENIANI Cotton Sticks.

Geniani Erie Humidifier

Introducing the newest innovation of air humidifiers for home or office!

The Erie Humidifier is a compact, yet powerful instant dryness fixer. Now you can have the capabilities of a room humidifier in a fabulous portable version. The mini humidifier also helps with the relief of allergy symptoms and dry cough.

Key features:

  • Sleek design & smart features
  • Portable, yet powerful
  • Offers up to 8 hours runtime
  • Silent action & night-light feature
  • Cost-effective compared to larger versions

Maintenance couldn’t be simpler!

Just a little effort to refill

The Erie personal humidifier can be refilled in seconds. Gently, with a single movement, unscrew the humidifier clockwise to fill it with water.

All-day or All-night Performance

You won’t have to worry about frequent refills since its 0.06 gal (250 ml) capacity is enough to last an entire office day, or night’s sleep.

Convenience at its best

This silent humidifier is such a great addition to an office, quietly working its magic for better air. It’s powered by most USB ports or sockets. Please note. The humidifier is not equipped with a battery; it is powered by a USB cord only.

One-button Control

Simple and intuitive one-button control to switch between operating modes. No hassle, just simple for optimal convenience.

Read more

Dry air is a definite plant killer. Just like your lungs need fresher air, so do most plants need a certain level of humidity to thrive. This small humidifier for plants will keep the air at optimum humidity level, so your lovely plants will have all the moisture they need to flourish.

At home – Perfect. At the office – Perfect. In the car – Perfect

Moisturize your skin

Moisturizing helps your skin stay young and reduces the chances of skin problems.

Safe for babies

With auto-shut off and a unique nightlight function, our humidifier is a nursery room must have! Ensure your children are receiving quality air throughout the night.

Quiet like breath

Ultra-quiet <30dB operating mode to deliver utterly silent operation.

Fits on cup holder

Designed in a sleek round style which allows it to fit in small spaces such as vehicle cup holders.

Read more

Product Description

YOUR CHOICE OF SHADE… Semi-Transparent Sunshades

Semi-transparent sunshades are for areas in which Sun & UV protection are more important than visibility such as baby car seat sun protection for infants, small children, pets, adults with sensitive skin, pilots of aircraft and watercraft, providing the ultimate protection for the whole family.

Transparent Sunshades

Transparent window shades are lighter shades, ideal for the front side window of a vehicle, where visibility is more important. It can also be used on any glass surface from your kitchen window to the school bus.

Quality Matters! 𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗼𝗿 𝗤𝘂𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘁y

Kinder Fluff sun shades are made of 120GSM (versus commonly used 80 GSM), combined with 15s tinted static-protective film (versus commonly used 10s).

𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗼𝗿 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻

Kinder Fluff Sunshades are made with higher quality connector clamps, preventing breakage/separation of the wires during folding.

𝗖𝗘𝗥𝗧𝗜𝗙𝗜𝗘𝗗 (SPF 100)

The Only Certified Window Sunshade in the Market!

Proven to block 99.79% of UVA and 99.95% of UVB!

With the max level of UPF in the category 50+

Trusted Brand

Kinder Fluff takes pride in doing it right! We open up the door & show you what to look for when choosing a high-quality sunshade.

-Because We Care-

(Flip to see more)

Feel The Difference…

This set contains 2 Transparent and 2 semi-transparent sunshades + a storage bag.

Made of 120GSM mesh and 15s film, this certified and award-winning sunshade, blocks more sun and ultraviolet rays, providing better sun protection to the skin.

Overlap to cover larger windows.

(Flip to see more)

𝗖𝗘𝗥𝗧𝗜𝗙𝗜𝗘𝗗

The Only Certified Window Sunshade in the Market!

Proven to block 99.79% of UVA and 99.95% of UVB!

With the maximum level of UPF in the category (50+) and maximum protection of 100 SPF.

(Flip to see more)

Overlap to fit

Designed to fit any large window size by simply overlapping. Perfect for car side windows, windshield, rear, back seat as a baby car seat sun protection, at home, in the office, on the boat, airplane, bus, train, farm… Kinder Fluff protects the whole family from sun exposure, including pets & plants.

Please Note: the shades are packed back to back to protect the film from damage & it may appear as 2 pieces rather than 4. Please pull them apart gently and you will have a complete set of 4.

(Flip to see more)

𝗜𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗮𝗿, 𝗮𝗶𝗿𝗽𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗲, 𝘀𝗵𝗶𝗽, 𝗯𝘂𝘀, 𝘃𝗮𝗻 𝗼𝗿 𝘁𝗿𝗮𝗶𝗻..

Protect yourself and your loved ones from the heat, glare and the damaging sun throughout the day.

According to EPA, most of an average person’s UV exposure from the sun occurs before the age of 18. Too much UV exposure or frequent sunburns, particularly during childhood, can cause severe or serious damage to the skin.

For peace of mind, go with certified sunshades, choose Kinder Fluff.

(Flip to see more)

𝗙𝗼𝗿 𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗼𝗼𝗿 𝘂𝘀𝗲

Do you have that kitchen window that lets too much sun in, spoiling your cooking activity?

Or an office window that the sun glares to your face when you are trying to see your laptop screen?

Then this sunshade is for you. Perfect sized at 20”x12″, it sticks to any glass surface including the ones inside the house and fits most window size by simply overlapping each other.

(Flip to see more)

𝗔𝗻𝘆𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲, 𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲…

Kinder Fluff sunshades are designed to fit any large window size by simply overlapping them. Perfect for car windows, windshield, and back seat windows as a baby car sun shade and also any large windows, such as aircraft or watercraft, or the ones inside your house.

If it is good enough for a pilot in high altitude , it is definitely good enough to protect you on the ground.

The only Certified Sunshade & The Winner of Mom’s Choice Gold Award Install and remove in seconds

Due to the static effect created by the film, this sunshade will cling to any glass surface without any suction cup or adhesive. simply put the shade on the window and gently press to stabilize.

Please Note: Dust is the main factor for the loss of static effect. In such a case, simply rinse the shades with cold water, wipe the window clean and it should be as good as new!

𝐆𝐎𝐋𝐃 𝐀𝐖𝐀𝐑𝐃

The Gold Winner of Mom’s Choice Award.

The Mom’s Choice Awards (MCA) evaluates products and services created for children, families and educators. The program is globally recognized for establishing the benchmark of excellence in family-friendly media, products and services.

𝗚𝗢 𝗕𝗘𝗬𝗢𝗡𝗗 𝗔𝗪𝗔𝗥𝗗

Winner of the global acknowledgement of businesses who went above and beyond to make the world a better place!

KinderFluff is dedicated to offering premium quality products and affordable for consumers who seek baby products that are both comfortable and safe, after all, “Because We Care” is our motto.

This is how it works…

Kinder Fluff Sunshades are made with tightly woven fabric structured with fewer “holes or spaces” for the UVR not to sneak through to your skin. The UV absorption is enhanced using black dye. Then the UV absorbers and blockers are added during the manufacturing process which also increase the sun protection ability of the mesh, providing extra sun protection and UVR block for the whole family and your car’s interior.

No suction cups or adhesive and definitely no residue

Due to the Static Effect created by the thick film, these shades “cling” to the window without any suction cups or adhesive. easy on easy off for any glass surface

𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗕𝗿𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗧𝗿𝘂𝘀𝘁

Often you won’t get any information about the structure of car window shades in the market. No one will tell you what type of fabric they are made of or what kind of film they use. Simply because they are not top of the line! Kinder Fluff takes pride in doing it right! We open up the door & show you what to look for when looking for a high quality sun shade. We’re the only brand with certified shades proven to block over 99%UVR rays & MCA Gold winner. We have confidence in our quality.

Anywhere, Everywhere…

Where sun and UVR protection is needed!

In the car, on the bus, airplane, boat, home or office… it clings in any glass type, even the ones inside of your house or tinted ones.

Please Note: Dust is the main factor for the loss of static effect. In such case, simply rinse the shades with cold water, wipe the window clean and it should be as good as new!

Remove from the pack & separate the shades carefully attached to each other by the cling film side.

How to install: 1.Wipe the window with a damp cloth. 2.Place the Window Shade with the static side on the window. 3.Apply pressure throughout the sun shade until it is firmly pressed to the window.

Note: It’s normal to see wrinkles on the shades when you first receive them. This is the nature of the film & happens during storage but it should open up after a couple of days.

When not in use Twist to Fold into a small circle and fit in the provided storage bag for easy storage inside any handbag, car organiser, sun visor strap or door pocket.

How to fold: 1. Put all the pieces that are to be folded together on top of each other. 2. Hold the shades on both sides. 3. Bring your hands towards each other with a twist. 4. The lightweight wire will fold itself into a small circle. 5. Store in the provided storage pouch.

Play the video for more.

What’s special about this sunshade?

It’s made of 120 GSM mesh (versus commonly used 80 GSM), paired with 15s static-protective film (versus commonly used 10s), offering superior quality & higher density, providing better sun/UV protection. It also comes in 2 transparency options.

How can I install and uninstall this?

Wipe the window clean, throw this bad boy over the glass and give it a gentle swipe. For folding, please see video for visual explanation.

Can I open the window with this sunshade on?

No. The shades attach to the glass so they need to be removed before operating the car window.

Mine arrived with some wrinkles. Is it normal?

Yes. This is due to the nature of the plastic film and happens during storage but it should open up after a couple of days.

What is included in the package?

This set includes 2 transparent shades, 2 semi-transparent shades & a free storage pouch. Please keep in mind they are packed back to back to protect the film from damage during shipping & may appear as 2 pieces rather sets. Pull them apart gently.

This set contains 2 transparent & 2 semi-transparent car window covers to use according to your need

These foldable baby car window shades are designed to fit any windows . Each car shade is 20″x12″

Absolute Sun Protection: EcoNour Car Window Sunshades protect your infants and pets from harmful UV rays and act as a sun blocker that provides great SPF protection. Featuring a size of 20 x 12 inches, it offers excellent sun protection.

No More Suction Cups: Our baby window shades are designed to adhere to car windows effectively, leaving no residue behind after removal thanks to the “Static Cling Technology.” It also gives your car an aesthetically pleasing look!
Hassle-Free Installation: EcoNour’s Car Window Shade can be installed in a few seconds. Roll up and clean the car windows using a damp cloth and stick the rear window shades to the glass.

EcoNour Car Window Sun Shade offers you exceptional protection from the hot sun, effectively blocking out all the UV rays and other harmful sun rays, with ease. Made out of durable 80 GSM for Transparent and 120GSM mesh for Semi-Transparent material along with 18S Static Film, EcoNour Car Side, and Rear Window Shade is a great solution to all the problems that occurred in the sun to your car and to your loved ones during the car ride.

NEVER WORRY ABOUT THE SUN’S HEAT!

  • Effective Transparency: EcoNour Windshield Sunshade’s transparent layer helps in the viewpoint of the exterior world without compromising on the sunray from entering inside the car.

The 80 GSM mesh allows a smooth transparent view when installed on your car windows without any compromise in sun protection. The 18S Static cling can come in handy for increased suction endurance when compared to the conventional 15S cling which is used by others.

  • Dual-Layer Design: Our window shade features an excellent, dual-layer design that gives the best of both material usage, the 18S Film and 80&120 GSM Mesh.
